name: How The Grinch Stole The Lives of 100 Whoville Citizens
name_original: How The Grinch Stole The Lives of 100 Whoville Citizens
description:
The Grinch finally snapped and now has a shotgun. Shoot your way through Whoville and defeat Santa in this demo!

I most likely will make the game slightly better looking in the future.

Controls:

Arrow Keys or A and D to Move.

W, Space Up Arrow Key or Z to Jump.

X or Left Mouse Button to Shoot.

Q or C to Switch Weapons.

The final product is slightly different than the video due to me forgetting to record.

Difficulty may be hard due to the time limit.

This game will be buggy because it was made in 5 days.

If you do see any bugs, please feel free to comment about them

I might not make a full game, but if this does well I'll try.

This game is sadly only available on Windows due to getting it out in 5 days.

If you do choose to play this game, please donate to support us!
